headline: Crown Castle to Present at the 2025 RBC Capital Markets Global Communications Infrastructure Conference
summary: HOUSTON, Sept. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE: CCI) ("Crown Castle") announced today that Sunit Patel, Crown Castle’s Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer is scheduled to present on Wednesday, September 17, 2025 at 9:30 a.m. Eastern Time at the 2025 RBC Capital Markets Global Communications Infrastructure Conference. The presentation will be broadcast live over the Internet and is expected to last approximately 20 minutes. The live audio webcast link and pre
